attributes.action: Allow the Bank of England to loan money to the general public and small businesses at its base rate.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Instead of spending large amounts of tax payers money bailing out the banks who refuse to pass on the lower rates to their customers. The Bank of England should loan money to the general public at their base rates, which should in turn force the banks to follow suit and kick start the economy.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with the Bank of England.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
